FM of DPRK Meets New Egyptian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Ismail Abdelrahman Ghoneim Hussein, new ambassador of the Arab Republic of Egypt to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him, on Monday.

DPRK Ambassador to Syria Appointed 
   Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Choe Su Hon was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Syria, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

Nombrado embajador coreano en Siria
   Pyongyang, 18 de agosto (ATCC) -- Segun el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Su Hon fue nombrado como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la Republica Arabe de Siria.
